item.title: Checkpoint One
item.description: How to Store Data Primitive variables Question to Learner Can you declare a variable? Why do programmers do this? Expected Answer let name = Pan; Textbook Answer: Data and Variables Video Reference Youtube Video Link Bonus Question: Explain how you would save and store an age of a cat. Answer: A variable is a name that refers to a value Arrays Data types Functions Objects (covered in class 7) Dot access operator How JS stores and manipulates data Console.

item.title: Checkpoint Two
item.description: How Loops Work Topic How to read a JS file tree How to run a program Getting user input How JS stores and manipulates data Question to Learner How do you pass a value into a function and then get a value out of a function? How do you decide when a function has a return value? Expected Answer function (num){ let total = num +num; return total}; Bonus Write a function that takes in a number to add to another number.
